HotelElement.Name: Hilton Garden Inn New York West

Photo.Caption: Double Bed Guest Room City View

Description.Text: The Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street hotel in New York City is perfectly located in Midtown Manhattan and is just steps from some of New York's best attractions including the Empire State Building, world-famous Macy's at Herald Square, Times Square, Broadway theaters and Madison Square Garden. Providing the finest quality and services, the Hilton Garden Inn Midtown Manhattan hotel in New York is perfectly designed for business or leisure guests, and offers an abundance of complimentary amenities ensuring your stay in the Big Apple is affordable, fun and hassle-free.

• Empire State Building - 2 blocks • Macy's Herald Square - 2 blocks • Madison Square Garden - 2 blocks • Broadway & Times Square - 7 blocks • Jacob Javits Convention Center - 10 blocks • Penn Station - 2 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 8 blocks • Port Authority Bus Terminal - 7 blocks

Hilton Garden Inn's guestrooms are newly built and state-of-the-art. The hotel's spacious non-smoking guestrooms boast more than 260 square feet and feature one king or two double beds, large work desk, 2 two line telephones, data ports, high-speed Internet access and large screen television with pay-per-view movies. Additional guestroom amenities include microwave, mini refrigerator, coffee maker, hair dryer and iron and ironing board. All rooms are 100% non-smoking.

The Hilton Garden Inn New York, NY hotel features 298 brand new guest rooms, including two luxurious suites. Each guest room is equipped with: • Spacious, newly appointed guestrooms with 32-inch LCD flat panel televisions, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and large work desks with adjustable lighting and ergonomic chairs • Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless internet access is available in each guestroom, featuring secure remote printing directly to our hotel's business center • Complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center, complimentary 24-hour Business Center, and complimentary wireless Internet access in the lobby • Complimentary morning coffee, tea, and USA Today® • Onsite hotel restaurant • Pavilion Pantry® Convenience mart - stocked with snacks, drinks & more
Check-in: 3:00PM Check-out: 12:00PM Pets: No Pets Allowed

From the South - Take New Jersey Turnpike (95N) to Exit 16 E toward Lincoln Tunnel; Keep left to take NJ 495 E toward Lincoln Tunnel. Continue straight to Dyer Avenue. Turn left onto West 34th Street, then right on 5th Avenue. Take a left on East 32nd Avenue, left on Madison Avenue and left on East 35th Street.
From the North - From 95 S take I-278 W; take Exit for Randall's Wards Island / Manhattan / FDR Drive; continue on Triboro Bridge. Merge onto FDR Drive S. Take Exit 8 toward I-495/Midtown Tunnel/E 34th Street. Continue straight onto FDS Drive Service Road W, make a right onto E 34th Street, then right on Madison Avenue and left on 35th Street.

A freshly prepared breakfast is available daily at the Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Streetâ€™s Great American Grill. This full-service hotel also offers nightly room service, a chic new lobby lounge, and 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart.
